definition: (computer science) a code for information exchange between computers made by different companies; a string of 7 binary digits represents each character; used in most microcomputers

lemmas.lemma: American Standard Code for Information Interchange

subject: noun.communication

slk: americký štandardný kód pre výmenu informácií
fin: American Standard Code for Information Interchange
ell: αμερικάνικος πρότυπος κώδικας ανταλλαγής πληροφορίας ASCII
fra: American Standard Code for Information Interchange
